name: A Void Dance
description:
Game Design with Reilly's Game Jam Entry: 

Three Events Only

Title:

A Void Dance

Controls: 

Arrow Keys (I recommend making the game full-screen so that you avoid having the web page itself moving every time you press the up or down buttons.)

Note: If you can't move initially when going full-screen, try clicking on the game screen first and then try moving again. (I will look into why it is doing this.)

Description:

A small game made in the Construct 3 engine.

Avoid all the projectiles and survive for 3 minutes... if you can...

This was a fun little exercise and I learned a lot through this game jam. Definitely going to implement some of the stuff I learned into some future titles I'm working on.

Looking forward to the next one!

Song Credit:

Pyro X - Pandora [Argofox Release]
